title: [WithU] NiziU 討論區 (2) 1202 日本出道專！1026 久妹生日快樂！

replies.msg:
NiziU（日語：ニジュー；韓語：니쥬），為日本索尼音樂娛樂和韓國JYP娛樂聯手打造的日本九人女子團體，成員通過JYP自製生存實境節目《Nizi Project》篩選而出。最終由九名成員山口真子（Mako）、大江梨久（Riku）、橫井里茉（Rima）、花橋梨緒（Rio）、勝村摩耶（Maya）、鈴野未光（Miihi）、小合麻由佳（Mayuka）、新井彩花（Ayaka）和牧野仁菜（Nina）組成，2020年秋季在日本出道。

團名「NiziU」由JYP娛樂公司創辦者朴軫永取名，有「Need you」的意思，「Nizi」代表由Nizi Project誕生的團體，「U」代表成員彼此和支持他們的粉絲，寓意為「人們永遠不可能靠自己一個人獲得成功，要記得你們需要彼此、需要粉絲。」

問候語為「We NiziU！我們是NiziU。」（日語：We NiziU！私たちNiziUです。/ 英語：We NiziU! We are NiziU.）



官方網站：https://niziu.com/s/n123/?ima=2116

Facebook：https://m.facebook.com/NiziUinfoofficial

官方資訊 Instagram：https://instagram.com/niziu_info_official?igshid=xi5ns33p5wg5

官方成員 Instagram：https://instagram.com/niziu_artist_official?igshid=13lhf5f48gi60

Twitter：https://mobile.twitter.com/NiziU__official

YouTube：https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCHp2q2i85qt_9nn2H7AvGOw[/quote]


日本出道先行專輯《Make You Happy》
發行日期：2020年6月30日
主打：Make You Happy
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QW28YKqdxe0

Detail about the ice cake fight

Maya: we decided to have party before going back to Japan, we wanted to eat something sweet, and some of the members said they wanted to eat a cake, but some wanted to eat ice cream, each of us was stubborn
Maya: so Ayaka suggested “ice cake” but then others were like “nah ice cake is just ice cream” , and we had to argue until like 0 am, at the end we had a general meeting...
Kato: wait, who were on ice cream side?
🙋‍♀️Nina, Maya, Mako, Rima, Ayaka
Riku & Rio: What? This many? You didn’t tell us !
Kato: and the cake side...?
🙋‍♀️Riku, Rio
Kato: How about you Mayuka? You didn’t raise your hand
Mayuka: It didn’t matter, I didn’t really care😂
Haruna: and how about Miihi-chan?
NiziU: Ah, Miihi was already asleep 😂
Kato: Couldn’t it be like majority vote?
Riku: nope, cuz ice cake was same as ice cream, right? I wanted chiffon cake, so I couldn’t agree with that ice cake theory
*Rio nodding behind Riku*
Kato: At the end what did you guys eat?
NiziU: Ice cream...
Riku: not even ice cake, but just ice cream
Kato: You were unhappy, right Riku-chan?
Riku: ah it was yummy tho, but yea I still wanted to eat a cake
